column4: Well, does anyone know of a decent audio player capable of handling streams that's CLI?
mplayer
Anything that is available in the repositories?
mplayer is in multiverse
Doesn't show as being available for me =/
multiverse isn't enabled by default, you need to enable it
I have multiverse enabled. :-P
pastebin your /etc/apt/sources.list
Is there a way to select all of the text of the file in a CLi-environment?
just open it in gedit:  gedit /etc/apt/sources.list  .  Or are you not in X at all?
No X.
you can't really pastebin anyway then :)  one sec
Everything except for my CD-rom is uncommented.
At least as far as repository links go.
run this command:  cat /etc/apt/sources.list | netcat jrib.dyndns.org 1234
you don't have feisty multiverse, you only have feisty-backports multiverse
http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/14985
I see.
edit the file and add " multiverse" to the end of lines 22, 23, 38, and 39
Ty for the assistance.
np
